Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: James C. Buie Sr. "Jim Buie"
Reviews.Content: We looked at several cameras but settled on the Fujifilm S8200 Kit because of the features.  It came with everything an amateur photographer might need.  We like the fact that we can zoom when we want to without having to add an extra lens.  The pictures are crisp and we can take great video when we want to.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for fathers day. Work beautiful, took over 600 pictures before needing new batteries. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Spitfire
Reviews.Content: The pictures are outstanding. Especially in low light. I mean no flash indoor pictures look great. Sharp and in focus every time. The batteries last a long too. Very easy to use. Glad I bought the kit and not just the camera alone. I love the view finder option too. Its my preferred method for shooting pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Astrid N. Roman
Reviews.Content: Great camera for school and personal use. it allows me to do almost everything I need to do when taking pictures. the only thing, i was under the impression that the zoom could be manually moved, but i realized that it is not. Other than that, I still love the product and everything that came with it.

Reviews.Title: Damaged starter kit
Reviews.Author: furleigh
Reviews.Content: One item in the package damaged, the lens cleaning fluid in the starter kit was damaged and needs to be replaced. All other items are fine and in working condition. The kit was not opened as it was obvious that there was some fault with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP 1/2.3" BSI CMOS Sensor
Fujinon 40x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 24-960mm
3.0" 460k-Dot LCD Monitor
HD 1080i Video at 60fps
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S8200 Digital Camera (Black) Kit. Includes: 16GB Memory Card, High Speed Memory Card Reader, 4AA Batteries + Charger, Tripod, Carrying Case & Starter Kit
